# Aviniti — App Development & AI Solutions

> Aviniti is a Jordan-based technology company specialising in custom mobile app development, web applications, and AI-powered business solutions. We serve businesses across Jordan, Saudi Arabia, and the UAE. Our tagline: "Your Ideas, Our Reality" (أفكارك، واقعنا).

## Company

- About: https://www.aviniti.app/en/about
- Contact: https://www.aviniti.app/en/contact
- Location: Amman, Jordan
- Languages: English and Arabic (full bilingual site)
- Founded: 2024

## Services

- Mobile App Development: Custom iOS and Android apps built with React Native, Flutter, and native SDKs
- Web Application Development: Fast, scalable web apps with Next.js, React, and Node.js
- AI Integration: Embedding Gemini, GPT, and custom ML models into business workflows
- Business Process Automation: Replacing manual workflows with intelligent automation pipelines
- Ready-Made Solution Systems: Pre-built, customisable software systems for common industry verticals

## Ready-Made Solutions (Products)

- Delivery App System: https://www.aviniti.app/en/solutions/delivery-app-system — $15,000 | 4–6 weeks | 3 apps (vendor dashboard, driver app, customer app)
- Kindergarten Management: https://www.aviniti.app/en/solutions/kindergarten-management — $9,000 | 4–6 weeks | 3 apps (admin dashboard, staff app, parent app)
- Hypermarket Management: https://www.aviniti.app/en/solutions/hypermarket-management — $20,000–$50,000 | 8 weeks | POS, loyalty app, inventory, multi-branch
- Office Management & Booking: https://www.aviniti.app/en/solutions/office-management — $8,000 | 4–6 weeks | booking + CRM dashboard
- Gym & Fitness Management: https://www.aviniti.app/en/solutions/gym-management — $25,000–$75,000 | 8 weeks | 6 apps including receptionist, trainer, and customer
- Property Rental Platform: https://www.aviniti.app/en/solutions/airbnb-marketplace — $12,000 | 4–6 weeks | host, guest, and admin apps
- Hair Transplant AI System: https://www.aviniti.app/en/solutions/hair-transplant-ai — $20,000 | 4 weeks | AI doctor tool + receptionist dashboard
- Barbershop Management: https://www.aviniti.app/en/solutions/barbershop-management — $35,000 | 5 weeks | owner dashboard, receptionist, barber app with AI

## AI Tools (Free, on-site)

- Idea Lab: https://www.aviniti.app/en/idea-lab — Validate business ideas with AI-powered market analysis
- AI Analyzer: https://www.aviniti.app/en/ai-analyzer — Analyse market potential and competitive landscape
- Get Estimate: https://www.aviniti.app/en/get-estimate — Instant AI-generated cost estimates for app projects
- ROI Calculator: https://www.aviniti.app/en/roi-calculator — Calculate expected return on investment before you build
